<title level="1" right="Focus 2" pfs="Standard">
[Enlarge Companion](/Spells.aspx?ID=1867)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 383 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** your animal companion
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Your animal companion grows much larger, towering over its foes in battle. Your animal companion becomes Large, gaining the effects of a 2nd-rank [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) spell.

---
**Heightened (4th)** Your animal companion instead becomes Huge, gaining the benefits of a 4th-rank _enlarge_ spell.
name: Enlarge Companion
